article:
Australia is the greatest   island in the world. It is much smaller than China. It is in the _ of the Earth. So when it is _ summer in China, it is cold winter in Australia.
Australia is big, but the population there is _ . The population of Australia _ the same as that of Shanghai, a city in China.
Australia is famous _ its _ and kangaroos. After a short drive from any town, you will find _ in the middle of white sheep. Sheep, sheep, _ are sheep. Have you ever seen a kangaroo? It has a "bag" in its body. The _ kangaroo keeps its baby kangaroo in the "bag". It is very interesting, isn't it?
